pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.conversations

Interface ConversationPrompt<T extends Content>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Accepting content type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIgnoringPrompt, ContactPrompt, DocumentPrompt, ExactMatchPrompt, IgnoringPrompt, LocationPrompt, NumericPrompt, RegexPrompt, StickerPrompt, TextPrompt, TextValidatingPrompt, VenuePrompt

    public interface ConversationPrompt<T extends Content>
    An element to a conversation, accepts a specific content type.
    Author:
    Mazen Kotb

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void conversationEnded(ConversationContext context)
      Called when the conversation has ended, either naturally or forcibly using the end method.
      boolean process(ConversationContext context, T input)
      Processes input from user
      SendableMessage promptMessage(ConversationContext context)
      The message sent before accepting input.
      ContentType type()
      The content type representation of type T.

    • Method Detail

      • type

        ContentType type()
        The content type representation of type T.
        Returns:
        Content type

      • process

        boolean process(ConversationContext context,
                T input)
        Processes input from user
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the conversation
        input - Input message from user
        Returns:
        Whether to repeat the prompt or not

      • promptMessage

        SendableMessage promptMessage(ConversationContext context)
        The message sent before accepting input. Not called if conversation is silent.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the conversation
        Returns:
        Message sent before accepting input
